message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product that is worth a significant amount to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the value it holds for me.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but $950000 is a bit lower than I was expecting. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a counteroffer. I'll sell the product to you for $1050000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the value it holds for me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1025000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the value it holds for me.

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I can see you're serious about this purchase. I'm willing to make another counteroffer, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'll sell the product to you for $1075000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value it holds for me.

I appreciate your willingness to make another counteroffer, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1050000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the value it holds for me.
